about.summary: Functions to calculate power and sample size for testing main effect or interaction effect in the survival analysis of epidemiological studies (non-randomized studies), taking into account the correlation between the covariate of the interest and other covariates. Some calculations also take into account the competing risks and stratified analysis. This package also includes a set of functions to calculate power and sample size for testing main effect in the survival analysis of randomized clinical trials and conditional logistic regression for nested case-control study.

Functions to calculate power and sample size for testing main effect or interaction effect in the survival analysis of epidemiological studies (non-randomized studies), taking into account the correlation between the covariate of the interest and other covariates. Some calculations also take into account the competing risks and stratified analysis. This package also includes a set of functions to calculate power and sample size for testing main effect in the survival analysis of randomized clinical trials and conditional logistic regression for nested case-control study.

name: r-powersurvepi
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1.5" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-powersurvepi
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/powerSurvEpi_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/powerSurvEpi/powerSurvEpi_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 538dc819e9df0d6b8a32aae7f4b882f49cfd1ead469d5baa57953fccb4572224

build:
  number: 1

  noarch: generic

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-pracma
    - r-survival
    - r-rmarkdown

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-pracma
    - r-survival
    - r-rmarkdown

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('powerSurvEpi')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('powerSurvEpi')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=powerSurvEpi
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Functions to calculate power and sample size for testing main effect or interaction effect in the survival analysis of epidemiological studies (non-randomized studies), taking into account the correlation between the covariate of the interest and other covariates. Some calculations also take into account the competing
    risks and stratified analysis. This package also includes a set of functions to calculate power and sample size for testing main effect in the survival analysis of randomized clinical trials and conditional logistic regression for nested case-control study.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - nsandau
